name: runner_up
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ncaa_final_four.
Tool description: Historical data for every NCAA Men's Final Four.  Get champions, coaches, records, seeds, final four teams and more in JSON format.
API description: Fetches the runner-up team data for the given identifying parameter from the NCAA Final Four API.

identifier.description: The identifier (e.g., year) to fetch the runner-up team data for.
